alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 3:44PM MDT until May 10 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Fremont County in central Colorado... Southwestern Teller County in central Colorado... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 344 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Cripple Creek, or 26 miles southwest of Colorado Springs, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cripple Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for central Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
